reviews.content: U can open the messages app after installing this, but if u tap the button where this tweak shud be it’ll make ur messages app keep crashing... even after a respring. Meaning u can never open the messages app again until u remove the tweak (hopefully).
Latest update causes messages to crash when entering any conversation
It works but messes up the spacing so you can’t see the last message form the other person. I ended up uninstalling this because it fixes one problem but created a more annoying problem.
If the photos icon does not show when you are composing a text message press and hold in the area where the photos app should be if that does not work please and reinstall the app and it will work.
